title: IS_PED_STOPPED
content:
0x530944F6F4B8A2140xA0DC0B87// IsPedStopped
BOOL IS_PED_STOPPED(Ped ped);Returns true if the ped doesn't do any movement. If the ped is being pushed forwards by using APPLY_FORCE_TO_ENTITY for example, the function returns false.
codeBlocks: Returns true if the ped doesn't do any movement. If the ped is being pushed forwards by using APPLY_FORCE_TO_ENTITY for example, the function returns false.
